mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 테이블명(projcet_num, email, category, title_image, simple_content, phone, project_start, project_end, current_invest, achive_invest, attach_1, attach_2, attach_3, company) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{email}, #{category}, #{title_image}, #{simple_content}, #{phone}, #{project_start}, #{project_end}, #{current_invest}, #{achive_invest}, #{attach_1}, #{attach_2}, #{attach_3}, #{company})
